verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Into Your hands
I commit again
With all I am
For You Lord
You hold my world
In the palm of Your hand
And I am Yours forever

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll walk with You
Wherever You go
Through tears and joy
I'll trust in You
And I will live
In all of Your ways
Your promises forever

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus I believe in You
Jesus I belong to You
You're the reason that I live
The reason that I sing
With all I am

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
I will worship
I will worship You
